channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024021747
item.description:
Report X-2024021747

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brought to the QA area with wet closures. One of the content bottle caps was loose, causing internal leakage. DescribePack: The content's cap was loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package absorbed the isopropyl alcohol.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was on Unload Bank 6, by door 63. One of the bottles was broken, causing internal leakage. DescribePack: Content bottle was broken. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Oil dry was used to soak up spill.

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazardous materials were used to gather the spilled hazmat put in hazmat bag in a pail. DescribePack: loose caps caused leakage from inside the box which caused package to be torn and ripped DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: hazmat materials were used to clean spill

item.title: Report X-2024021349
item.description:
Report X-2024021349

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-05T15:11:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND INSIDE OF NON-HAZARDOUS TOTE. THE PACKAGE WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED. DescribePack: THE BOTTOM AND THE SIDES OF THE PACKAGE WET. THE LEAKAGE WAS ABSORBED THROUGHOUT THE CARDBOARD BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS SPILL CLEAN UP.

item.title: Report X-2024021719
item.description:
Report X-2024021719

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-05T00:31:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: PEARL
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat was being unloaded and QA was called to retrieve the package, package was put in a red tote and taken to the Hazmat area to be processed. DPR was done and awaiting the disposition. DescribePack: the tops were loose and contents wasted out. The can had clamps on it, but paint still seeped through the lid. They were 1 gallon aluminum cans. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA pushed the lids back down, placed them in a drum packed properly with plastic bags and etc.
